fields.name: Administrative
fields.description: Responsible for managing office tasks and systems to maximize efficiency, including databases, office equipment, and records management.

fields.name: Human Resources
fields.description: Manages employment-related tasks, team engagement, recruitment, benefits, and employee concerns.

fields.name: Operations/Delivery
fields.description: Handles day-to-day activities related to production and distribution of products or services, resource coordination, and logistics.

fields.name: Product/Service Development
fields.description: Focuses on creating new and existing offerings for sale, conducting research, designing, and overseeing production.

fields.name: Purchasing
fields.description: Procures goods and services, negotiates prices, maintains vendor relationships, and ensures compliance with policies.

fields.name: Sales
fields.description: Converts prospects into clients or customers, conducts market research, pitches sales, and collaborates with other departments.

fields.name: Marketing
fields.description: Generates leads for the sales team, develops effective strategies, and ensures products or services meet customer needs.

fields.name: Accounting
fields.description: Manages financial records, transactions, budgeting, and reporting.

fields.name: Information Technology
fields.description: Handles technology infrastructure, software development, cybersecurity, and network management.

fields.name: Research and Development
fields.description: Innovates, conducts research, and develops new products or technologies.
